2. Faith is that which secures our walking in Christ as in the way, without error, our abiding in him as in the root with fruit, our standing upon him as a foundation without being shaken. Therefore, all seducers who labour to injure our faith are to be shunned and avoided3 for by that means they attempt to separate us from Christ.
